name: Launch Pad Fade Piano
description:
Feature
- Play many song from US-UK pop
- Become DJ with launch pad in your phone
- Beautiful UI and glow effect for launch pad
- Songs will be updated weekly
- Find songs by name and artist
- Add song to your favarite tab
- Highscore and rank with player all over the world
- Weekly chart for songs

How to play?
Touch to note when it appear in screen. Feel the music and choose right time to touch.
If you miss too much you will lose the game.
